name: Marking Public Affairs bvba
goal: To offer strategic advice to health and social affairs stakeholders (companies, NGOs, think tanks, policy makers) with the aim to put/keep their issues on the EU policy agenda and support the implementation of these public affairs strategies
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Food Safety, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives:
- EU research activities (Horizon Europe)
- EU health policy and activities (incl. Health Programme)
- European Pillar of Social Rights
- Social OMC
- Food safety
- Pharmaceutical policy and legislation
- AHA-EIP
- Chronic disease initiatives (including mental health)
- Health inequalities
- EAsI
- Social Protection Committee
- European Semester
- ESF
